interpretation:
The "sunflower" emoji represents positivity, joy, and growth. This card is a reminder to embrace the light and let it shine on all aspects of your life. Just as the sunflower turns its face towards the sun, it's time to turn towards the things that bring you happiness and fulfillment. This card is a symbol of hope and encouragement, reminding you that you have the power to brighten your own day. 

In a reading, the "sunflower" card may indicate a time of personal growth and new beginnings. It may also suggest that it's time to focus on the positive aspects of your life and let go of any negativity or self-doubt. Overall, this card is a symbol of happiness and optimism, reminding you to keep your face towards the sun and let your light shine.
